name: places/ChIJk0Fq6rdZwokRVcgb20mrpgg
adrFormatAddress: 1488 2nd Ave, New York, NY 10075-1353, USA

originalText.text:
Keys and Heels Speakeasy on the Upper East Side of NYC is nothing short of a hidden treasure, earning its well-deserved five-star rating. With a friendly staff and a lively atmosphere, it stands out as a must-visit destination for those seeking a memorable night out.

The staff at Keys and Heels Speakeasy embody the essence of exceptional service. From crafting expertly mixed cocktails to offering recommendations, the staff's dedication to customer satisfaction shines through.

The speakeasy's ambiance is the perfect blend of nostalgia and contemporary energy. The dimly lit space, reminiscent of the Prohibition era, adds an air of mystery and intrigue. It's an ideal setting for those looking to unwind with friends or enjoy a night out with a buzz of excitement in the air.

The menu at Keys and Heels Speakeasy is a testament to mixology craftsmanship. The cocktails, expertly crafted with precision and creativity, offer a wide range of flavors to suit diverse tastes. Each sip is a delightful journey of taste and aroma, making it a go-to spot for cocktail enthusiasts.

In conclusion, Keys and Heels Speakeasy on the Upper East Side is a five-star gem that excels in both service and atmosphere. Whether you're seeking a cozy evening or a lively night out, this speakeasy delivers an exceptional experience. Highly recommended for those looking to enjoy expertly crafted cocktails and a buzzing ambiance in the heart of the Upper East Side.

originalText.text: Amazing spot! Such a good speakeasy! Delicious cocktails. The staff have always been the kindest. And our servers have made an effort to get to know us and make us feel welcome.

text.text: Amazing spot! Such a good speakeasy! Delicious cocktails. The staff have always been the kindest. And our servers have made an effort to get to know us and make us feel welcome.

originalText.text: The cocktails here were well presented and made. Got to taste 5 different cocktails and while none were bad, none blew my socks off either. The music was also a bit too loud. Had to constantly yell to hear each other. All in all I‚Äôd say it‚Äôs still worth the experience of a cool speak easy.

originalText.text:
I first wandered in looking for a place to have my keys copied and shoes shined. Standing with a pair of my loafers and keys to my new apartment, I was told it was a speakeasy. What a surprise!

I must say, this place exceeded all my expectations! From the moment you step through the discreet entrance, you enter a sitting area of elegance and sophistication.

The first thing that struck me was the incredible attention to detail in the ambiance incorporating the üîë and üë† in the decor. The cozy seating arrangements create an intimate atmosphere for you and your friends. It truly feels like stepping into a secret world.

Okay, let's talk about the drinks! The mixologists, Israel aka ‚ÄúIzzy‚Äù made the most incredible old fashion. My friend had the spritz which she enjoyed. The manager Diego was very welcoming and friendly. He bounced around to each table making sure everyone was comfortable.

Our waitress, Stephanie was very knowledgeable, friendly and welcoming. Everyone took time to engage with guests, offering recommendations and sharing personal favorites.

Really an AWESOME experience. I‚Äôll be back!

originalText.text: Been here a few times with my girlfriend and friends for Halloween and the Magic show. Highly recommend the latter. Always a good time with cocktails (try the spritz bomb!) in a fun atmosphere.

text.text: Been here a few times with my girlfriend and friends for Halloween and the Magic show. Highly recommend the latter. Always a good time with cocktails (try the spritz bomb!) in a fun atmosphere.
